item.title: SpeedTest测速
item.description: 1. 安装脚本 curl -fsSL git.io/speedtest-cli.sh | sudo bash 下载不了可以新建 #!/usr/bin/env bash # # Copyright (c) 2020-2021 P3TERX <https://p3terx.com> # # This is free software, licensed under the MIT License. # See /LICENSE for more information. # # https://github.com/P3TERX/script # File name: speedtest-cli.sh # Description: Install Ookla Speedtest CLI # System Required: GNU/Linux # Version: 1.3 # set -o errexit set
